event_summary: Coffee industry expo showcasing Vietnamese coffee culture, sustainable farming practices, and specialty coffee roasting techniques.
commentary_summary: Coffee industry experts highlighted Vietnam's growing reputation for quality coffee and successful farmer cooperation models.
next_event_plan: Establish coffee quality certification program and create direct trade platform connecting farmers with international buyers
event_highlight: Vietnamese specialty coffee won international cupping competition beating 200 entries from 40 countries
event_object: To promote Vietnamese coffee excellence and support smallholder farmers through sustainable practices
event_conclusion: Connected 500 farmers with buyers, generated $5 million in export contracts, and launched 3 coffee cooperatives
event_conclusion_overall: Highly successful festival that elevated Vietnam's position in global specialty coffee market
next_event_suggestion: Add barista championship and create coffee tourism trail through highland growing regions
